titles.title: Oh God, my heart is filled with Praise

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh God, my heart is filled with praise and it's all about You
you are awesome, you are great and you are powerful in my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh Lord, you are my strength when im weak and i cannot stand up

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: oh Jesus, you died for me on the cross of calvary, you shed your blood for me so I can be clean and white
